Title: The Hows of Us
Writer: Cathy Garcia-Molina (story), Carmi Raymundo (screenplay), Gilliann Ebreo (screenplay), Cathy Garcia-Molina (screenplay)
Actors: Kathryn Bernardo, Daniel Padilla, Darren Espanto, Jean Garcia
Plot: A young couple dream of growing old together as they as they deal with the struggles of being in a long-term relationship.
